actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an itemized deduction for certain salaries and other compensation paid for personal services.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers an income tax deduction for salaries paid to individuals for personal services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an itemized deduction for certain salaries and other compensation paid for personal services.
